Item ID1093

The rune plateskirt is a plateskirt made out of runite. It requires level 40 Defence to wear. The rune plateskirt is identical in function to rune platelegs, but is 1kg lighter in weight.

It can be created with the Smithing skill by using 3 runite bars and a hammer on an anvil; this requires level 99 Smithing and yields 225 Smithing experience.

Players may receive these from the crystal chest if they are a female character.

Along with the rune 2h sword and platelegs, this is the best bar-per-alch item in the game. If smithing for money, rune 2h sword, platelegs, and plateskirt will give the best value for each bar.

[[File:Rune plateskirt detail.png|120px|left]]
The '''rune plateskirt''' is a [[plateskirt]] made out of [[runite]]. It requires level 40 [[Defence]] to wear. The rune plateskirt is identical in function to [[rune platelegs]], but is 1kg lighter in weight.

It can be created with the [[Smithing]] [[skill]] by using 3 [[runite bar]]s and a [[hammer]] on an [[anvil]]; this requires level 99 Smithing and yields 225 Smithing [[experience]].

Players may receive these from the [[crystal chest]] if they are a female character.

Along with the rune 2h sword and platelegs, this is the best [[bar]]-per-[[Alchemy spells|alch]] [[item]] in the game. If smithing for money, rune 2h sword, platelegs, and plateskirt will give the best value for each bar.
